attributes.action: Change current law to make sure that all agency workers are given an exact length of employement on there contracts.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition is to change law, so that all agency staff will work a specific length of time. This is in order to stop companys hiring staff telling them it is long term and then getting rid of them a week later. A length should be arranged earlier and stuck to by the employers.
